misc: Loves basketball even more than Marcus, making some fans wonder if he's a real golfer
biography: Pasi, affectionately known as "Susi-Pasi", is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing Vuosaari Golf Helsinki. With a competitive spirit and a distinctive style, Pasi has secured one victory in the Hector Trophée and is eagerly anticipated to participate in the upcoming tournament in 2025, marking his fourth appearance.

Off the golf course, Pasi harbors a passion for basketball that rivals even Marcus's enthusiasm. His dedication to the sport has led some fans to jokingly question whether he truly identifies as a golfer, adding a unique layer to his persona within the golfing community.
Pasi's engaging personality and remarkable dedication make him a player to watch.
